Translations.Text: Kye batalinaako kumanya kwonna wadde bakadde baabwe, kibi nnyo ekigambo ekiva mu mimwa gya bwe. Bye boogera temuli okugyako bulimba bwereere
Olw'okunnyolwa, olabika nga obula kwetta ku lwa bwe olw'okuba tebakkiriza bigambo bino
Mazima ffe twassa ku nsi ebigiriko nga bya kuginyiriza olwo nno tubagezese ani asinga okukola ebirungi
Mazima ffe tugenda kufuula ebigiriko ettaka ekkalu
Oba olowooza nti ddala abantu bo mu mpuku, n'ekiwandiiko ekibakwatako baali baakyewunyo nnyo okusinga eby'amagero byaffe ebirala
Mu kiseera abavubuka bwe beewogoma mu mpuku nebagamba nti ayi Mukama omulabirizi waffe tuwe okusaasira okuva gyoli era otwanguyize ensonga yaffe gye tuliko otuwe obulungamu
Netukuba ku matu gaabwe (ekibikka) nga bali mu mpuku (nebeebaka) emyaka mingi
Oluvanyuma twabazuukusa kimanyike nti, kiriwa ku bibiina ebibiri ekisinga okwogera ekituufu ku bbanga lye baamalamu
Mazima ffe tukunyumiza ekyafaayo kya bwe mu butuufu, mazima bo baali bavubuka abakkiriza Mukama omulabirizi waabwe era netubongera obulungamu

Era twasiba ekimyu ku mitima gyabwe bwe baayimirira (mu buvumu) nebagamba nti Mukama omulabirizi waffe ye Mukama omulabirizi w'eggulu omusanvu n'ensi, n'olwekyo tetuyinza ku mulekawo ne tusaba Katonda mulala yenna era bwe tukikola mazima tuba twogedde ekigambo ekibi
Abo abantu baffe baamulekawo (Katonda) nebeeteerawo ba katonda abalala, kale nno singa babaleetako obujulizi obweyolefu, naye ani eyeeyisa obubi okusinga oyo agunja ku Katonda ebigambo eby'obulimba
